text: Per Allan Magnus Claësson Uggla (pronounced ; born June 18, 1954 in Stockholm) is a Swedish artist, composer, actor, and occasional radio host. He is known for songs with satirical lyrics. Breaking through in the 1970s, in 2006, he released his 13th studio album.Jakten på Magnus Uggla , Café 28 June 2006 == References == ==Other websites== *Official Magnus Uggla website Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Stockholm Category:Musicians from Stockholm Category:Writers from Stockholm
title: Magnus Uggla
